review_blob: Absolutely my favorite beer. Great fresh hop aroma from the Cascade & Centennial hops. Dark gold in appearance w/ a slight head that slowly dissipates leaving a sticky lacing on the glass. Flavor is hop forward w/ a slight malty flavor on the finish. Very easy drinking and great at 4.9%.

Smell of fresh citrus hops, cloudy amber appearance, bitter hop flavor on the front end with a malty flavor through the drink & slight nearly perceivable sweetness on the finish. Very well balanced and sessionable.
